comment:
* Filter event sent from {@link Filter} objects with download type.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public int getDownloadId()
methods.comment:
* Gets download ID. * *

This query is only supported in Tuner 2.0 or higher version. Unsupported version will * return {@code -1}. * Use {@link TunerVersionChecker#getTunerVersion()} to get the version information.

methods.name: public int getMpuSequenceNumber()
methods.comment: * Gets MPU sequence number of filtered data.

methods.name: public int getItemFragmentIndex()
methods.comment:
* Gets current index of the current item.
     *
     * An item can be stored in different fragments.

methods.name: public int getLastItemFragmentIndex()
methods.comment: * Gets last index of the current item.

methods.name: public int getDataLength()
methods.comment: * Gets data size in bytes of filtered data.
